title: Frederick Gathering of Eagles
text:
The Frederick Gathering of Eagles is a group for Eagle Scouts in Frederick County, Maryland. We welcome both adult and youth Eagles to join us for activities and networking opportunities.

Become a member today!
There are multiple ways to contribute and qualify for membership:

Be a registered Scout leader or youth
We are currently seeking members to join our board and/or help develop activities for the Frederick Gathering of Eagles.
Donate to the Frederick Gathering of Eagles



We look forward to hearing from you!
Need the following:

Contact information
Calendar dates for upcoming board meetings
Information on upcoming activities

title: Board
text: Here is some information about the board, who we are, and how to volunteer.

title: Frederick Gathering of Eagles
text:
The Frederick Gathering of Eagles is a group for Eagle Scouts in Frederick County, Maryland. We welcome both adult and youth Eagles to join us for activities and networking opportunities.


We are currently seeking members to join our board and/or help develop activities for our group. There are multiple ways to contribute and qualify for membership:

Be a registered Scout leader or youth
Volunteer on the Frederick Gathering of Eagles Board or a committee
Donate to the Frederick Gathering of Eagles




Need the following:

Contact information
Calendar dates for upcoming board meetings
Information on upcoming activities

title: Activities
text:
6 PM at Dutch’s Daughter

The official yearly GOE celebration/recognition dinner will be at Dutch’s Daughter, May 29. Gathering time starts at 6:00 PM, a full dinner is provided, and it’s free (although donations to the GOE to support Scouting in Frederick County are welcomed and encouraged). We need to start getting a head count NOW so, if you plan to attend, please let us now ASAP. All Eagles are invited, whether they are members or not, but we particularly want to celebrate the achievement of those Scouts who received their Eagle rank this year. We will be sending out an email to all Troop Scoutmasters and Committee Chairs to invite all Eagle youth, but if you are a member of a unit, you can help to spread the word and let them know about the dinner if they are interested.




12:00 - 6:00 PM at Baker Park

This is a great opportunity to at least see what Frederick County Scouting is doing. If you want to help, please contact us - need to figure out how to do this without exposing names and email addresses. If you just want to come down and see what is going on, that’s fine, too.


Scouts

Build Cool things Spot climbers, Recruit!

Adults

Engage the interested public Bring Scout Crafts Recruit cub scout parents

Tear down: 6pm - 7pm 8 scouts, 4 adults
Set up: 11am - noon 8+ scouts, 4 adults

(pioneering skills useful) unload logs, build structures, have fun

Volunteer shifts will be staffed in two hour intervals from noon to 6pm. We need 6 scouts and 2 adults (min) per shift.

title: Activities
text:
Past Activities

February 17 - Happy Hour at Attaboy Brewery
On February 17, we had a social gathering at the Attaboy Brewery in East Frederick. We had 11 members attend, which was about 28% of our membership. This was very successful and all who attended had a great time.
